topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455a7146368721ef7350100#post_5455a7146368721ef7350100
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455a3e563687267af360000#post_5455a3e563687267af360000
Remember those days when we had to deal with those right-wing "Religious Justice Warriors"? Yeah, those were the days alright.

Now we have to deal with getting the left-wingers to drop the whole "Social Justice Warriors" political movement crap.[/bq]
Actually I don't mind, because the chances are we'll never go Sweden levels batshit crazy.  My guess is that what's going to happen in the usa is that we're going to become central-left; basically like gays are totally accepted and such, but instead of having to fight against the religious culturally we're going to be fighting against the progressive left.

I hate the sjw movement and third wavers, *BUT* I'd much rather them be the metaphorical villain than the religious right.  I still vehemently oppose sjw or whatever you want to call them, but if I had to choose between fighting against sjw who want "hir" added to the dictionary and fighting people who want being gay criminalized I would rather choose the first one.

Basically what is happening in the usa in a nutshell is imagine progressive vs conservative as a scale of 1 to 10; in the 1950's we were a 10, now we're about a 6, where we're heading is about a 4 instead.  Liberal, but not overly liberal; just to the point women, minorities and glbt are treated the same.
